materials.raw_text:
Acetic Acid (C2H4O2) - 20 grams 
 Phosphoric Acid (H3PO4) - 40 grams 
 Water - 100 grams 
 Sodium Acetate (C2H3NaO2) - 15 grams 
 Calcium Carbonate (CaCO3) - 25 grams 
 Sodium Bicarbonate (NaHCO3) - 10 grams

sourcing.instructions:
Acetic Acid - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Phosphoric Acid - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Water - Tap water or distilled water. 
 Sodium Acetate - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Calcium Carbonate - Health food stores or garden supply centers. 
 Sodium Bicarbonate - Grocery stores (baking soda section).
steps: Acetic Acid - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers.
Phosphoric Acid - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers.
Water - Tap water or distilled water.
Sodium Acetate - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers.
Calcium Carbonate - Health food stores or garden supply centers.
Sodium Bicarbonate - Grocery stores (baking soda section).
1. Measure 20 grams of Acetic Acid and pour it into a clean mixing bowl.
2. Add 40 grams of Phosphoric Acid to the bowl and mix gently with a spatula.
3. Gradually add 100 grams of Water while stirring continuously to ensure complete dissolution.
4. Introduce 15 grams of Sodium Acetate and stir until fully dissolved.
5. Slowly add 25 grams of Calcium Carbonate and mix until a uniform paste forms.
6. Finally, incorporate 10 grams of Sodium Bicarbonate and mix thoroughly until no lumps remain.
preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 20 grams of Acetic Acid and pour it into a clean mixing bowl. 
 2. Add 40 grams of Phosphoric Acid to the bowl and mix gently with a spatula. 
 3. Gradually add 100 grams of Water while stirring continuously to ensure complete dissolution. 
 4. Introduce 15 grams of Sodium Acetate and stir until fully dissolved. 
 5. Slowly add 25 grams of Calcium Carbonate and mix until a uniform paste forms. 
 6. Finally, incorporate 10 grams of Sodium Bicarbonate and mix thoroughly until no lumps remain.

steps: Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant container. Heat to 60째C (140째F) for 30 minutes while stirring continuously to promote chemical reactions. Ensure the mixture does not boil.
heating.raw_text: Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant container. Heat to 60째C (140째F) for 30 minutes while stirring continuously to promote chemical reactions. Ensure the mixture does not boil.

steps: Remove the mixture from heat and allow it to cool to room temperature for approximately 1 hour. Ensure it is in a well-ventilated area to avoid the buildup of any gases.
cooling.raw_text: Remove the mixture from heat and allow it to cool to room temperature for approximately 1 hour. Ensure it is in a well-ventilated area to avoid the buildup of any gases.

steps: Once cooled, pour the mixture into a mold sized to fit the dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches. Allow it to set for 24 hours at room temperature. After setting, remove from the mold and let cure for an additional 48 hours. Optionally, sand the edges to smooth any rough areas.
post_processing.raw_text: Once cooled, pour the mixture into a mold sized to fit the dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches. Allow it to set for 24 hours at room temperature. After setting, remove from the mold and let cure for an additional 48 hours. Optionally, sand the edges to smooth any rough areas.
